description:
One of the Top-10 Bitrix Gold Certified Partners in Ukraine, Avivi is a fast-growing outsourcing company based in Canada and Ukraine. We provide website design on Bitrix24 and full Bitrix24 customization to help companies reach a new level of corporate communication and efficient management.

If you come to our offices, you won’t be able to count how many times we say ‘Bitrix’ every day – so often! No one ever called it this way, but we can say our team truly lives a ‘Bitrix’ life: dynamic, multitasking, productive. We believe in Bitrix24 as a very promising and powerful platform, and are proud to be proficient specifically in it. Our professional team is willing to dedicate all our skills, creativity and experience to finding best and most effective solutions for Bitrix/Bitrix24 needs of any company.
High quality and reliability, friendly and supportive customer relations, low hourly costs, and a big passion for our job – here are some reasons why companies from all over the world choose us. Much more of what we can and who we are is yet to be discovered by you. Contact us to get to know us better and experience a quality and enjoyable collaboration!
